comment-list.a11y-filter-correct: Filters all posts marked as correct
comment-list.a11y-filter-wrong: Filters all posts marked as wrong
comment-list.a11y-select-time: Option to set the period for the posts to be displayed
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1h: Show all posts of the last hour
comment-list.a11y-select-time-3h: Show all posts of the last 3 hours
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1d: Show all posts of the last day
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1w: Show all posts of the last week
comment-list.a11y-delete-all-comments: Deletes all posts of this room
comment-list.a11y-delete-banned-comments: Deletes the posts of the moderation list.
comment-list.a11y-export-comments: Exports all posts of this room.
comment-list.a11y-export-banned-comments: Exports all posts of the moderation list.
comment-list.comment-stream-stopped: The post stream has been stopped.
comment-list.comment-stream-started: The post stream has been started.
comment-list.banned-comments-deleted: The moderation list has been deleted.

comment-page.a11y-shortcuts: To create a post, press key 1. Once there are multiple posts, you can search and filter posts. To browse the posts press key 2, to sort posts key 3, to filter posts key 4, to select the time period key 5, to pause or resume the post stream key 6, to go to the first post key 7, to go to the user menu key 9, to go back to the room overview key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
comment-page.a11y-shortcuts-moderation: Once there are multiple posts, you can search and filter posts. To browse the posts press key 1, to sort posts key 2, to select the time period key 3, to go to the first post key 4, to go to the public post list key 5, to go to the user menu key 9, to go back to the room overview key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
comment-page.a11y-message: You are now on the posts page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-message-moderation: You are now on the moderation page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-comment-grade: Marks this post as a favorite
comment-page.a11y-comment-banish: Bans this post from the public Q&A list
comment-page.a11y-comment-reject: Puts this post on the public Q&A list
comment-page.a11y-comment-not-marked-wrong: Marks this post as not correct
comment-page.a11y-comment-answered: Go to your answer of this post
comment-page.a11y-text-correct: This post was marked as correct.
comment-page.a11y-text-grade: This post was marked as a favorite.
comment-page.a11y-text-read: This post was discussed in full view.
comment-page.a11y-text-wrong: The post was answered in the negative.
comment-page.a11y-message-answer: You are now on the post answer page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key now or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-shortcuts-answer: To post a reply or go to your reply press 1, to go to the user menu press 9, to return to the posts page press 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
comment-page.a11y-enter-answer: Enter an answer to this post here.
comment-page.a11y-entered-answer: You have answered the post with {{answer}}.
comment-page.a11y-delete-answer: Deletes your answer to this post
comment-page.a11y-save-answer: Saves your answer to this post
comment-page.a11y-edit-answer: Option to edit the answer for this post
comment-page.a11y-close: Close the answer dialog and return to Q&A list
comment-page.a11y-rejected: moved to the public Q&A list.
comment-page.comment: Post {{ comment }} was asked at {{ time }} and has currently {{ votes }}. {{correct}} {{wrong}} {{bonus}} {{read}} {{answer}}
comment-page.mark-read: You discussed this post in full screen mode
comment-page.new-comment: A new post with the content, {{ comment }}, has been asked.
comment-page.search-box-input-description: Here you can search for post.

content.a11y-content-create-message: You can now create a new content. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call up the announcement later via the Escape key.
content.a11y-content-edit-message: You can now edit your content.
content.a11y-content-create-shortcuts: To enter a new content press key 1, to change the content format press key 2, to change the question series press key 3, to access the user menu press key 9, to return to the room overview press key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
content.a11y-enter-body: Enter the content here. Note: This text field supports text formatting with markdown.
content.a11y-enter-flashcard-answer: Enter the answer here. Note: This text field supports text formatting with markdown.
content.a11y-enter-content-group: Use the arrow keys to select one of your  question series or crate a new one by entering.
content.a11y-enter-answer: Enter a new answer here and press the enter key to add it.
content.a11y-enter-another-answer: Enter another answer or go back to select right and wrong answers.
content.a11y-answer-checkbox: Use the space bar to determine whether the answer {{answer}} is right or wrong.
content.a11y-answer-marked-correct: You have marked the answer as correct
content.a11y-answer-marked-wrong: You have marked the answer as wrong
content.a11y-answer-added: Answer has been added, go back to delete, edit or mark the answer as correct or incorrect
content.a11y-choose-format: Change the format of your content. THe current format is {{format}}
content.a11y-single-choice: Currently you've chosen the format Single-Choice. Switch to multiple-choice with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-multiple-choice: Currently you've chosen the format multiple choice. Switch to Single-Choice with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-answer-yes: Currently the answer to this content is “Yes”. Change to “No” with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-answer-no: Currently the answer to this content is “No”. Change to “Yes” with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-answer-neither: Currently there is no correct answer selected for this content.
content.a11y-submit: Creates the entered content in your question series {{group}}.
content.a11y-content-created: Yor content has been saved. You can now create a new content.
content.a11y-preview: Shows a preview of the entered content.
content.a11y-preview-header: Below you will find your content from the perspective of the participants.
content.a11y-leave-preview: Brings you back to the creation of contents.
content.a11y-back-in-creation: You are now back in the content creation.
content.a11y-content-list-message: You are now in your question series {{name}}. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call up the announcement later via the Escape key.
content.a11y-content-list-shortcuts: To create a new content press key 1, to navigate to the statistics key 2, to open a menu for more settings key 3, to lock or unlock the content key 4, to go to the question series contents key 5, to edit the name of the question series key 6, to go to the user menu key 9, to go back to the room overview key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
content.a11y-content-list-contents: The question series contains {{count}} contents. Navigate through your contents with the tab key now.
content.a11y-edit-content-group-name: Change the name of the question series here
content.a11y-create-content: Create a new content for this question series
content.a11y-nav-to-stats: Navigate to the statistics of this question series
content.a11y-open-group-settings: Open a menu for more settings
content.a11y-publish-statistics: Publish statistics of this question series
content.a11y-dont-publish-statistics: Lock statistics of this question series
content.a11y-publish-correct-options: Publish statistics of this question series
content.a11y-dont-publish-correct-options: Lock statistics of this question series
content.a11y-lock-collection: Lock all contents of this question series
content.a11y-unlock-collection: Unlock this question series for participants
content.a11y-statistics-are-published: The statistics are published for participants
content.a11y-statistics-are-not-published: The statistics are locked for participants
content.a11y-correct-options-are-published: The correct answers are published for participants
content.a11y-correct-options-are-not-published: The correct answers are locked for participants
content.a11y-selected-content: You have now selected the content {{name}}.
content.a11y-unlock-contents-up-to: Release all contents up to here
content.a11y-lock-contents-up-to: Lock all contents up to here
content.a11y-all-published: All contents of this question series are published.
content.a11y-more-options: Show more options for this content
content.a11y-add-to-content-group: Add this content to another question series
content.a11y-add-to-this-content-group: Add this content to the question series {{name}}
content.a11y-new-content-group: Add this content to a new question series
content.a11y-remove-content-from-group: Remove this content from question series. If the content is no longer in any question series, the content will be archived.
content.a11y-archived-contents: You are now in the view for your archived contents. Here you can add single contents to a question series or create a new question series with all archived contents.
content.a11y-archived-create: Creates a question series which contains all archived contents.
content.a11y-archived-create-with-name: Creates a question series with the name {{name}} which contains all archived contents.
content.a11y-edit-content-group-sort: Start the sorting of the question series
content.a11y-delete-answers: Delete all answers to this content
content.a11y-delete-all-answers: Delete all answers of this question series
content.a11y-wordcloud-info: Used keywords by frequency in descending order.
content.answers-deleted: Answers to this content got deleted.
content.all-answers-deleted: Answers of this question series got deleted.
content.at-least-one: Please select at least 1 correct answer.
content.unsaved-answer: You haven't added the last answer yet.
content.need-answers: Please add at least two answers.
content.no-empty: No empty fields allowed. Please check your content.
content.only-one: Please select exactly one correct answer.
content.max-answers: There's a maximum of eight answers.
content.same-answer: Same answer label is not allowed.
content.answer-neither: Do not set a correct answer
content.updated-content-group: Name of question series was updated.
content.content-group-update-failed: Something went wrong. Maybe the question series is already present?
content.added-to-content-group: Your content was added to question series.
content.md-info: In this input field text formatting with Markdown is supported.
content.archived-contents-description: Here you can see contents which have not been assigned to a question series. Add single contents to an existing or a new question series or create a new question series containing all archived contents.
content.content-group-created: New question series has been created.
content.format-choice-description: Participants can choose from several answer options. There can be one or more correct answers.
content.format-scale-description: One of the predefined answers can be selected.
content.format-binary-description: It can be answered with "Yes" or "No". None of the options must be correct.
content.format-text-description: Participants can answer the question with a text entry.
content.format-slide-description: Slides are used to present information.
content.format-sort-description: Participants can answer the content by ordering the answers.
content.format-flashcard-description: With flashcards participants can learn with front and back.
content.format-wordcloud-description: Participants can answer with keywords. The relative frequencies are visualized in the form of a word cloud.
content.format-not-supported: This format is currently not supported.
content.max-keywords-out-of-range: Keyword limit must be between {{min}} and {{max}}.
content.content-group-deleted: Your question series has been deleted.

survey.a11y-message: You are now in live feedback mode. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or use the Escape key to call up the announcement later.
survey.a11y-shortcuts: To know the status of the current live feedback press key 5, to start or stop the live feedback press key 1, to change the type of live feedback press key 2, to access the user menu press key 9, to return to the room overview press key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
survey.a11y-status: Currently the live feedback is {{status}}. {{answers}} participants have answered yet. {{state0}} percent have selected answer {{answer0}}, {{state1}} percent have selected answer {{answer1}}, {{state2}} percent have selected answer {{answer2}}, {{state3}} percent have selected answer {{answer3}}.
survey.a11y-status-changed: The live feedback has been {{status}}. Press enter to {{nextStatus}} the live feedback.
survey.a11y-change-type: Changes the type of the live feedback.
survey.a11y-first-stop-survey: You have to stop the live feedback before you can change the type.
survey.started: Your live feedback has been started.
survey.stopped: Your live feedback has been stopped.

room-page.a11y-settings: Navigates to the settings where you can manage the room and its posts and add moderators or categories.
room-page.a11y-shortcuts: To access the Q&A list press key 1, to access the live feedback key 2, to create a new question series key 3, to navigate through your question series key 4, to go into presentation mode key 5, to view more options for the room key 6, to announce the current user count key 7, to access the user menu key 9, to access the back button key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
room-page.a11y-room-message: You're now in your room {{room}} with the key {{key}}. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.a11y-create-content: Opens a form to create new contents.
room-page.a11y-create-content-group: Opens a dialog to create a new question series.
room-page.a11y-content-groups: In this room there are {{count}} question series. Tab between them and press Enter to edit contents or settings in the question series.
room-page.a11y-no-content-groups: There are no question series in this room yet. Press key 2 to create a new question series.
room-page.a11y-enter-content-group: Opens the question series {{name}}. This question series is {{locked}}.
room-page.a11y-moderator-message: You are now in the room {{room}}, which you are moderating. To get information about key combinations, press the Enter key now or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.a11y-moderator-shortcuts: To access the Q&A list press the key 1, to access the moderation overview the key 2, to access the user menu the key 9, to access the back button the key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
room-page.a11y-moderation-disabled: This room is currently not moderated.
room-page.a11y-share: Opens a dialog box that displays the room link and a QR code. Also you can copy the room adress.
room-page.a11y-switch-role: Switch role to see participants view.
room-page.a11y-more-options: Shows more options for this room in a menu.
room-page.a11y-user-count: Currently there are {{count}} persons in this room.
room-page.a11y-user-count-only-one: Currently you are the only in this room.
room-page.content-group-created: Your question series has been created.
room-page.room-loading-error: The room could not be loaded
room-page.no-content-groups: There are no question series yet.
room-page.group-locked: The question series is not released

settings.a11y-message: You are now in the room settings. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
settings.a11y-shortcuts: To get to the general room settings press key 1 to get to the Q&A settings key 2, to manage moderators key 3, to manage categories key 4, to get to the user menu key 9, to return to the room overview key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
settings.a11y-room: You are now in the general room settings. Here you can edit the name or the description of the room or delete the room.
settings.a11y-comments: You are now in the Q&A settings.
settings.a11y-access: You are now on the access rights panel. Here you can add or remove moderators or set a password for this room.
settings.a11y-categories: You are now in the category administration. Here you can add or remove categories.
settings.a11y-threshold-changed: You have set the threshold to {{value}}.
settings.a11y-add-moderator: Add the entered User as Moderator
settings.a11y-moderator-username: Enter the username or email of the user you want to add as a moderator
settings.a11y-room-name: Give the room a new name here.
settings.a11y-direct-send: Slider to send posts directly to participant
settings.a11y-threshold: Slider for setting the threshold for visible posts
settings.a11y-room-description: Enter a description for the room
settings.a11y-save-changes: Saves the changes to the room.
settings.a11y-collapse-settings: Leave the {{name}} settings or navigate with tab through the settings.
settings.user-not-found: No user was found with this username.
settings.creator: Administrator
settings.disabled-for-guests: You can't assign access rights with a guest account.
settings.question: Question
settings.tokens-deleted: All tokens of this room have been deleted.
settings.no-bonus: No bonus points have been given yet.
settings.threshold-info: If a threshold value is set, only posts that have received a higher rating are displayed.
settings.direct-send-info: If this setting is deactivated, a moderator or the lecturer must activate new posts before they become publicly visible.
settings.comment-moderation-info: There is a moderation list for checking new posts. Also, posts can be moved to this list afterwards.

statistic.a11y-message-overview: You are now on the statistics overview. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
statistic.a11y-message-evaluation: Content {{index}}, {{content}}. There are no answers yet.
statistic.a11y-message-evaluation-answers: Content {{index}}, {{content}}. {{answers}} participants have answered to the content. Navigate through the answers with the tab key.
statistic.a11y-message-presentation: You are now in the content presentation. Press the tab key to go to the content and navigate between the contents with the arrow keys.
statistic.a11y-shortcuts-overview: To go to the selection of the content series press the Tab key. Then navigate through the results of the question series. To get to the user menu press the 9 key, to get back to the room overview press the 0 key or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
statistic.a11y-group-progress: {{percent}} percent of the contents in the question series {{group}} were answered correctly.
statistic.a11y-content-result: The content {{content}} has been answered by {{count}} persons so far, {{abstentions}} persons have abstained.
statistic.a11y-choice-result: The content was answered correctly by {{percent}} percent.
statistic.a11y-go-to-statistic: Press the Enter key to get to the evaluation of the content.
statistic.a11y-no-more-answers: There are no more answers. Press the right arrow key to go to the next one.
statistic.a11y-answer-indicator: Indicates with the color green which answers are correct.
statistic.a11y-show-chart: Shows a bar chart which displays the evaluation of the answers.
statistic.a11y-no-answers-yet: There are no answers yet to display.
statistic.a11y-no-more-questions: There are no more contents available.
statistic.show-flashcard-back: Show the back of the flashcard
statistic.hide-flashcard-back: Hide the back of the flashcard

dialog.a11y-cancel: Cancels the current process and closes the dialog.
dialog.a11y-delete: Confirms the action and closes the dialog.
dialog.a11y-qr-code: The QR code of your room is now displayed in full screen mode. Press the Tab key to copy the url of your room to the clipboard or the Escape key to close the dialog and return to the room overview
dialog.a11y-copy-url: Copy link to room to the clipboard
dialog.a11y-send: Sends your post and closes the dialog.
dialog.a11y-tag: Select a category here if you want to categorize your post.
dialog.a11y-comment-presentation: The post {{comment}} is now displayed in full screen mode. Press the Escape key to close the dialog and return to the Q&A list.
dialog.really-delete-comment: Do you really want to delete this post?
dialog.really-delete-comments: Do you really want to delete all posts of this room? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.really-delete-banned-comments: Do you really want to delete all posts of the moderation list? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.really-delete-comments-hint: There are posts in this room that you marked for a bonus. Remove the markers to delete all posts.
dialog.really-delete-answer: Do you really want to delete this answer?
dialog.really-delete-content: Do you really want to delete the following content? The content will be irrevocably deleted in all question seriess.
dialog.really-delete-user-rights: Do you really want to remove the access rights of the following user?
dialog.really-delete-room: Do you really want to delete the following room? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.really-delete-token: Do you really want to delete this token?
dialog.really-delete-tokens: Do you really want to delete all tokens of this room?
dialog.really-remove-content: Do you really want to remove the following content?
dialog.really-delete-content-group: Do you really want to remove the following question series
dialog.cancel-description: Cancels the current process and closes the dialog.
dialog.content-group-name-input: Enter the name of the question series you want to create here.
dialog.content-group-created: Your content was added to new question series.
dialog.url-copied: Room link was copied to the clipboard.
dialog.really-delete-answers: Do you really want to delete the answers to this content?
dialog.really-delete-all-answers: Do you really want to delete all answers of this question series?
dialog.how-to-proceed: How would you like to proceed?
dialog.publish-contents-up-to-here: Release all contents up to here

utils.formatting-image-hint: Please note that images with a large file size can affect loading times.

presentation.a11y-welcome: You are now in presentation mode. Information for joining the room are displayed. If you want to know about key combinations, press the enter key or press the key i later.
presentation.a11y-shortcuts: Use the keys 1, 2, and 3 to switch between the Q&A list, question series and live feedback. Press the key q to display information for joining the room, the key f to enter or exit full screen mode, or the escape key to exit presentation mode and return to the room overview.
presentation.a11y-comment-message: You are now presenting the Q&A list. Press the enter key to get information about keyboard shortcuts.
presentation.a11y-comment-shortcuts: Use the arrow keys to navigate between posts. Use the plus and minus keys to zoom in or out on the current post.
presentation.a11y-present-comment: The following postFQ  is now presented: {{comment}}
presentation.a11y-content-message: You are now presenting the contents of the question series {{group}}. Press the enter key to get information about keyboard shortcuts. Press the tab key to get to the current content.
presentation.a11y-content-shortcuts: Navigate between your contents using the arrow keys. Press the spacebar to see the results, the key c to see the correct answers, or the key l to lock or unlock the content.
presentation.a11y-survey-shortcuts: Press the key 5 to know the status of the live feedback, the spacebar to start or stop the live feedback and the key c to change the type of the live feedback
presentation.a11y-entered-fullscreen: You are now in fullscreen mode.
